author: daxian-dbw
body:
The first round of adding tab completion tests - issue: #4160
---------------------------------------------------
246 tests are added in this iteration.
Summary of addressed areas:

CommandCompletion.cs
- [x] negatives cases/error handling (if some of these can't be hit, consider converting to asserts)
- [x] nested runspace/remote runspace
- [x] getting next result including wrap around
- [x] user overridden tabexpansion
- [x] legacy tabexpansion
- [x] ~~remove PSv2 code~~ `PSv2CompletionCompleter` is for tab completion in a remote session that is from win8+ to win7, so it needs to be kept.
- [x] adding/handling quotes

CompletionAnalysis.cs
- [x] filename after redirection
- [x] DSC resource

CompletionCompleters.cs
- [x] fully qualified cmdlet
- [x] complete module name
- [x] positional parameter

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: We have two non-resolved Issues #1265 and #3373 - maybe add pending tests for them for tracking?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Don't see any negative cases for the unhit error handling code, debugger, and remote runspace

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
@iSazonov for those 2 issues, tests should be added along with the fix.
@SteveL-MSFT I didn't rerun code coverage, but I will add more tests to cover those areas.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
The tests you have seem fine, but as I'm looking at the code coverage report some other areas missing (I'll summarize it here including prior feedback):

CommandCompletion.cs
- [x] negatives cases/error handling (if some of these can't be hit, consider converting to asserts)
- [ ] in debugger
- [x] nested runspace/remote runspace
- [x] getting next result including wrap around
- [x] user overridden tabexpansion
- [ ] legacy tabexpansion
- [x] ~~remove PSv2 code~~ `PSv2CompletionCompleter` is for tab completion in a remote session that is from win8+ to win7, so it needs to be kept.
- [x] adding/handling quotes

CompletionAnalysis.cs
- [ ] cursor position (you have some of these covered, not sure if all)
- [ ] filename after redirection
- [ ] line continuation
- [x] DSC resource

CompletionCompleters.cs
- [x] fully qualified cmdlet
- [ ] remove workflow code
- [x] complete module name
- [ ] import-dscresource
- [x] positional parameter

etc...

It might be worth doing separate PRs per source file to keep them reasonable to review

------------------------------------
[edited by @daxian-dbw]: Moved this tracking list to #4160

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT I added more tests in this first iteration, and the covered areas are listed in the PR description. Please take another look when you have time.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT @adityapatwardhan Your comments have been addressed, please take another look when you have time.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT your comment is addressed, please take another look when you have time. Thanks!

title: Add more tab completion tests
